strings: <voice_0x01001242><se_def><center>I heard this story from my great-grandmother.

<voice_0x01001243><se_def><center>She told me how her own great-grandmother
<center>was a renowned sage who came from the
<center>western continent to be married.
<voice_0x01001244><se_high><center>A sage? What do you mean?
<voice_0x01001245><se_def><center>I didn't really understand at first either.

<voice_0x01001246><se_def><center>But apparently even though she was a woman,
<center>she was a master of sword-fighting and magic.

<voice_0x01001247><se_high><center>Really?
<center>So...

<voice_0x01001248><se_high><center>Maybe that's why you're so good at them too.
<center>Maybe it came from her.

<voice_0x01001249><se_def><center>If only...
<center>But I'm not under any illusions.

<voice_0x0100124A><se_def><center>I'm sure there's room for improvement with
<center>my sword work, and any real magician
<center>would think my magic's just child's play.

<voice_0x0100124B><se_high><center>You think? Well I can't do either.
<center>If you ask me, your magic's amazing.

<voice_0x0100124C><se_def><center>Thanks, but it really isn't.
<center>In fact, if you ask me...

<voice_0x0100124D><se_def><center>I wasn't the one who inherited our ancestors'
<center>magic. I think it was you, Jessica.

<voice_0x0100124E><se_def><center>I'm sure there are abilities and skills
<center>that haven't yet been awakened in you.
<center>But one day they will be.

<voice_0x0100124F><se_def><center>And I can't wait to see you
<center>when that day comes.
<voice_0x01001252><se_low>King Trode: Ah... She's finally coming to...
<voice_0x01001253><se_high>Jessica: And you, King Trode...
<voice_0x01001254><se_high>Jessica: What...? What happened? I feel like I've just woken up from a really long dream...
<voice_0x01001255><se_low>King Trode: Ah, it looks like you're back with us at last.
<voice_0x01001256><se_low>King Trode: Don't you remember? You disappeared the day after we defeated Dhoulmagus.

<voice_0x01001257><se_high>Jessica: ...Yes... I do remember...
But wasn't that all a dream?
<voice_0x01001258><se_high>Jessica: I was being controlled by a hideous magical force... Just like Dhoulmagus was.
<voice_0x01001259><se_high>Jessica: It was this huge, terrible, evil, magical...being...
<voice_0x0100125A><se_high>Jessica: The Lord of Darkness...Rhapthorne!

<voice_0x0100125B><se_high>Jessica: But I've found some things out.
Listen, I've got so much to tell you...

<voice_0x0100125C><se_low>King Trode: There's no need to rush.
Just take your time, and start at the beginning.
<voice_0x0100125D><se_high>Jessica: Yes...

<voice_0x0100125E><se_high>Jessica: Rhapthorne was ordering me to do things.
He told me to seek out and destroy the heirs of the seven sages so his seal would be broken.
<voice_0x0100125F><se_high>Jessica: Rhapthorne once terrorised the world, and it was the seven sages who managed to seal away his soul.
<voice_0x01001260><se_high>Jessica: They didn't have the power to destroy him completely, but they shut his soul away in the sceptre and sealed it with their mystical blood.

<voice_0x01001261><se_high>Jessica: Rhapthorne's curse seeks to destroy those
sages' heirs...
<voice_0x01001262><se_high>Jessica: Master Rylus, my brother Alistair, Abbot Francisco and the man from Baccarat...
<voice_0x01001263><se_high>Jessica: Everyone who's been killed has been an heir of one of the seven sages.
<voice_0x01001264><se_low>King Trode: Hm... The plot thickens!
<voice_0x01001265><se_low>King Trode: Do you mean to say that the reason Medea and I haven't been turned back to normal is also to do with this Rhapthorne fellow?
<voice_0x01001266><se_high>Jessica: I don't know... But there are only three heirs left. David, and two others.
<voice_0x01001267><se_high>Jessica: If the heirs of all seven sages are wiped out, Rhapthorne's seal will be broken and he'll escape from the scept<endash>
<voice_0x01001268><se_high>Jessica: That's it! The sceptre!

<voice_0x01001269><se_high>Jessica: King Trode! Where is it?
Where's the sceptre!?
<voice_0x0100126A><se_low>King Trode: You mean the royal treasure?

<voice_0x0100126B><se_low>King Trode: Come to think of it, I don't know.
I lost sight of it in all of the hullabaloo.
<voice_0x0100126C><se_high>Jessica: ...No!
<voice_0x0100126D><se_high>Jessica: David's in danger! Whoever picks up the sceptre will fall under Rhapthorne's control!

<voice_0x0100126E><se_high>Jessica: We have to find it!
We have to save David!

<voice_0x0100126F><se_high>Jessica: Come on, <hero>!
We must find the sceptre before it's too late!
<voice_0x01001250><se_high>Jessica: Uh... Ugh...
<voice_0x01001251><se_high>Jessica: I'm...back with you...
